"A.P.241/3/23/10:30":
"Well done, <%me>!
We're still not quite sure what happened,
but it's unlikely we'll see it again."

"Once again, I'll share the information about
the planet we just transferred to."
"That star is located in a point of subspace that's not quite the same as ours."
"In layman's terms, it's a whole new world in a completely different dimension!"

"And different dimensions spells out convoluted travel.
Needless to say, investigations are in order."
"So in short, that star exists within a different dimension, where other intelligent life exists."

"Shining like a pearl...
This new world is called \"Earth.\""
"By the way... When you visited Earth briefly, I'm sure you recall communicating with Hitsugi to be rather second nature."
"I've just finished gathering data on Earth's language."

"As soon as this debriefing is over,
I'll try to pry some info off the
Intelligence Department's hands."
"...They're just kinda not giving it to us unless it becomes relevant. Commander Ulc was right... this is fishy. Stinky fishy!"
"We're even having trouble anchoring Earth's transfer co-ordinates as it is."
"All of that aside, we have more important matters to discuss!"
"After all, it's thanks to the efforts of <%me> and Hitsugi that we may begin to bridge the divide between Oracle and Earth!"

"Though, there's the question of how do we send you there without proper co- ordinates...
I'm not sure myself."
"It seems like your desire to save Hitsugi triggered a response with the Photons and helped transfer you over to Earth."
"Wow, I've really gone off tangent. Well, you should be able to travel to Earth now. But we're still investigating, so keep our activites a secret."
"Optical Camouflage and Spatial Quarantine measures have been employed so you shoud be able to operate without alerting Earthlings... Maybe."

"...Since this technology's from
the Intelligence Department,
I'm still doubtful."
"The technology is said to be made possible by Transparent Blade Mai's latent abilities, but it all seems sketchy."
"Problems are popping up left and right and all around. We'll have to double our investigation efforts!"
"Oh! That's right, I forgot! I've got another important piece of information!"
"We have lost trace of the Dark Falz-like presence that appeared on Naberius."
"I've ordered a pursuit, but frankly speaking, odds are slim. I'm sorry."
"However! The silver lining is that, Hitsugi and <%me> are able to come into contact, forming a link!"
"1. Contact?"
"2. What is a link?"
"Don't you remember? When you tried to save Hitsugi, your hands came into contact."
"During that brief contact, some of your photons flowed into her and we are able to capture her signature."
"It's thanks to that, that we were able to trace her in time to save her."
"It also allowed us to sniff around Earth to gather intel. It's just like killing two birds with one stone!"

"With ARKS advanced technology, it would be easy to look into her daily life!
Hehehe... What scenes would you want to see?"
"1. Isn't that peeping?"
"2. In that case..."
"Not so! This information is strictly in the name of gathering information for Xiao-- I swear on my honor! It's perfectly fine!"
"Besides... Only us two will ever see it, so there's nothing to worry about."
"Well, the information we can get from doing this is inconsistent and fragmented. No saying Xiao can even predict what we'll end up seeing."
"So close, yet so far... How disappointing!"

"All jokes aside, collecting
information is paramount. There's abundant
intelligent life there, after all!"
"We may accidentally peep into some private moments, but it's in the name of research. I'll do my best to sift through the info!"
"The nex day."
"ARKS Quest [Phantom Creation Species Repel Mission: Tokyo] was received."
"-Guardian's awaking-"
"目覚めの時"
